title: PHILADELPHIA 3-Step Cheesecake
directions: Tap or click steps to mark as complete
Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with mixer until blended. Add eggs; beat just until blended.
Bake 40 min. or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 3 hours.
ingredients: 2 pkg. (8 oz. each) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 ready-to-use graham cracker crumb crust (6 oz.)
